title: Fix Vercel build: use uv venv
description: Vercel now enforces PEP 668 (uv-managed system Python) so pip install fails. Update vercel build script to install deps via uv into a project venv (.venv) and run forecast pipeline.
close_reason: Fixed by switching Vercel build to uv venv

title: Fix Vercel pip install (PEP 668) via vercel.json installCommand
description: Vercel is still running default install step  and failing due to PEP 668 externally-managed env. Add  override in vercel.json (skip) and deploy static  as outputDirectory.

title: Ingest Polymarket Watch alerts feed
description: Add https://strangeloopcanon.github.io/polymarket_prediction/ to sources and ingest its alerts.json into standard raw items for daily summaries/predictions.
